note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Prevalence rate of obesity in adults
subtitle: Estimated prevalence of [obesity](#dod:obesity) in adults, based on general population surveys and statistical modeling. Obesity is a [risk factor](#dod:risk-factor) for chronic complications, including [cardiovascular disease](#dod:cvd), and premature death.
